termsAndConditions.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
info: By accessing and using Leading Houz services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

termsAndConditions.heading: 2. Use License
info: Permission is granted to temporarily use Leading Houz services for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

termsAndConditions.heading: 3. Disclaimer
info: The materials on Leading Houz's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Leading Houz makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

termsAndConditions.heading: 4. Limitations
info: In no event shall Leading Houz or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Leading Houz's website, even if Leading Houz or a Leading Houz authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

termsAndConditions.heading: 5. Accuracy of Materials
info: The materials appearing on Leading Houz's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Leading Houz does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current.

privacyPolicy.heading: Information We Collect
info: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, submit an application, or contact us for support. This may include:

• Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number, etc.)
  • Application details and documents
  • Communication preferences

privacyPolicy.heading: How We Use Your Information
info: We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
  • Process your applications and transactions
  • Send you technical notices and support messages
  • Respond to your comments and questions

privacyPolicy.heading: Information Sharing
info: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal identification information to others. We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners and trusted affiliates.

privacyPolicy.heading: Data Security
info: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

privacyPolicy.heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
info: Leading Houz has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. We encourage users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect.
